item.title: [Capush] fixed camera unit
item.description: The fixed cam is a basic unit type whose main functionality is to provide access to a networked camera. For our proof of concept implementation, we selected a Raspberry PI as the base unit as it has a small form factor while providing the convenience of a full Linux distribution. These boards come equipped with a range of wired and wireless network connections, and are often readily available in many fabrication workshops.
